To make a pepperoni and cheese pizza, preheat the oven to 425 degrees Fahrenheit. Roll out the pizza dough and place it on a greased baking sheet. Spread pizza sauce over the dough, then top with pepperoni and cheese. Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
